resources.string: We need your permission to proceed

plurals.name: never_ask_again_header
plurals.item: Please, tap %s > Permissions, then enable the following permission
Please, tap %s > Permissions, then enable the following permissions

plurals.name: permission_rationale_header
plurals.item: We need your permission to proceed

resources.string: To take photos and record videos, we need permission to access your camera.
To find out your location, we need permission to access the phone\'s GPS.
To find out your location, we need permission to access the phone\'s GPS.
To access files in your device, we need permission to read the phone\'s disk.
To store files in your device, we need permission to write to the phone\'s disk.
